name: Midgard Adventure
description:
Here is the version 0.55. 

Featured :

 -> Mulitplayer (Max players : 4) ;

-> Quests -> Character improvement (via Shop NPC) ;

-> 5 playable classes with a special skill (that can be bought at Shop NPC);

 -> 4 Levels random generated (Main Town, Newbie field, Orc field, Dark Mage dungeon);

 -> A balanced game difficulty (need to adjust a bit, but it should be playable);

 -> Mob and player respawn after death ;

-> NPCs (Chief, Shop, Quest, Healer) ;

-> Saved characters stats (not quests yet) ;

-> Better spawn system for NPC and Players; 

->Quest system should be fine;

 ->Third skill (Middle Mouse Button) obtained after beating the Dark Mage (Quest reward);

 ->2D VFX for healing and other stuff; 

->New sounds (BGM and sfx); 

->NPC Shop and Quest trigger on being near the player; 

->Tiles reworked for better looks; 

->Loading bar when game begins; 

-> Orc Dungeon added;

-> HP of enemies are increased by number of players;

-> Enemy pathfinding;

-> Corrections of few bugs;

Most of this features have been tested with 1 or 2 player not more so there can be some bugs with 2+ players. 

Don't hesistate to comment about bugs / imrpovements. :)
